alert.note: Alert for Brantley; Clinch; Coastal Camden; Coastal Glynn; Inland Camden; Inland Glynn; Northeastern Charlton; Northern Ware; Pierce; Southern Ware; Western Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 7:42PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Nassau, northwestern Baker, northeastern Columbia, Camden, southwestern Glynn, south central Pierce, southern Brantley, southeastern Ware, southeastern Clinch and Charlton Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 741 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Folkston, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Kingsland, Waycross, Hilliard, Folkston, Woodbine, Callahan, Nahunta, Stephen Foster State Park, Taylor and Homeland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Brantley; Clinch; Coastal Camden; Coastal Glynn; Inland Camden; Inland Glynn; Northeastern Charlton; Northern Ware; Pierce; Southern Ware; Western Charlton
